''Online gambling in Australia is subject to strict regulations, with certain forms permitted under licensed operators while others are prohibited. The legality of online gambling is primarily governed by the Interactive Gambling Act 2001.''

== Legal Forms of Online Gambling ==
In Australia, certain forms of online gambling are legal, provided they are offered by licensed operators. These include:

* Online sports betting
* Online racing betting
* Online lotteries

== Prohibited Forms of Online Gambling ==
Certain forms of online gambling are prohibited in Australia, including:

* Online casinos
* Online poker
* In-play sports betting

== Player Liability ==
Australian players are not liable for using offshore gambling sites. While it is illegal for operators to offer prohibited services to Australians, players themselves do not face legal penalties for accessing such services.

== Operator Liability ==
Operators offering prohibited online gambling services to Australians face significant penalties under the Interactive Gambling Act 2001. This includes fines and potential legal action.
